features: Easy Installation and Removal – Includes all parts necessary for installation and can be set up simultaneously with a Luxe Bidet attachment. Quick-release feature makes removal a snap and enables easy cleaning around the toilet seat and bidet.

High Quality Parts – Built with durable plastic and withstands up to 300 lb. Customized hardware holds both toilet seat and Luxe bidet attachment securely in place. Non-slip bumpers prevent shifting and sliding.
Slow-Close Toilet Seat – Slow-close feature prevents slamming for a peaceful bathroom environment. Reduces risk of injuries from accidentally slamming toilet seat.
A Perfect Fit - Sits beautifully on top of most standard round toilet seats. Designed to fit seamlessly with any Luxe Bidet attachment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install, Sturdy Seat
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Luxe toilet seat that I have purchased. The first one was for my toilet that includes a Luxe bidet. However, I purchased this one for my guest bathroom toilet that does not have the bidet (as this seat can be used in either situation). The seat is extremely easy to install, and installs very snug and tight to the bowl. It also allows for adjustments so that you can get the seat perfectly centered on the bowl (in case the bolt holes of the toilet were not cast perfectly). The plastic is high quality and not flimly, and the rubber bumpers on the bottom allow for the seat to have full, soft contact with the rim of the bowl. The best part is that when you lift the seat to the raised position, you can simply remove it from the anchor posts for easy cleaning! When the seat is in any other position, it is locked onto the anchor bolts. Lifting it to the open position releases the "lock" so that you can lift it up to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install works with other bidets
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install and works with my tushy bidet. If you're replacing a cheaper seat the plastic on this one is much thicker and stronger. The slow falling seat is nice and quite. It takes a little bit of force to pull the seat off the easy release hinges but it's pretty nice being able to remove the seat to clean. The hinges themselves also look really nice when the seat is fully down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with my Tushy bidet!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a hard time finding a seat that worked well with my Tushie and finally found one that works. Very easy to install and fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this seat to go with my bidet. Very easy to install an it has a slow shutting lid. It's sturdy and overall worth it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on my Luxe bidet. I tried to make the bidet work with spacers on my old toilet seat at first and it was awful. Pulled the trigger on this seat and it fit perfectly. Comfortable seat too.The only weird thing is that it gets this black powder-like residue built up on the bottom of the seat. I’m not sure if that’s because it’s near the heater or not, but my old seat never did that. It has gotten better over time, but still happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toilet seat is easy to install and well priced. Works great when you buy the bidet also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and straight forward installation
reviews.reviewText: Like the soft close feature and compatibility with bidet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely toilet sear
reviews.reviewText: We love it, it fits perfect with the Luxe Bidet we had the Neo 180 now the Neo 185 works great with either one.I love the soft close. It looks classy for a toilet seat and feels very well built. Also it doesnt slip around like cheap seats do. If you have a bidet or dont this is a great toilet seat, happy with the purchaseThanks Luxe for your outstanding products.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent seat to compliment your Luxe bidet!
reviews.reviewText: I decided to upgrade my well used Luxe neo 120 bidet with the newer designed Luxe 120 neo PLUS after years of problem free use. (The Luxe 120 Neo PLUS bidet has a new feature of tilting up to clean bidet easier.)I was looking for a seat that Luxe made for their bidets because I was un-impressed with just using a my old seat with sticker bumpers, they are harder to clean and come lose over time .Just follow the simple instructions that come with new seat for easy installation The luxe seat is a well designed seat for their bidets and does work well when seated on it. It feels comfortable and it does rest on all 4 bumper pads underneath when weight of person is seated on it. It was a easy installation after reading their instructions and does not move at all when a person is adjusting them self's to seat properly when wanting bidet water to hit a certain area of butt .It is also removable and easier to clean ceramic toilet area underneath + where the bumpers are on the luxe seat are a easier clean. It is just a much better seat than my $25 dollar cheap hardware store seat and highly recommend it for any Luxe bidet attachment !Very happy with using this toilet seat & is well thought out, Thanks Luxe!

I have a bidet neo 320 installed on my round toilet for over 2 years and I love it. I used a wooden seat of good quality but with the bidet it just wasn't that comfortable I 75 years old and I need something comfortable I installed the lux toilet seat in less than 15 minutes. Good instructions made very easy I love it fits me great the soft close is a nice little axtra touch. I highly recommend this seat cost is worth every penny.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy, easy to install, compatible with the bidet
reviews.reviewText: I bought this seat because the other one I had was not compatible with the Luxe Bidet. This is perfectly compatible with the bidet, but not only that, it's also a very good seat. The installation is simple, and its quick release system is convenient. I found that it doesn't move to the sides at all while sitting (my past two seats had this issue even if I tightened the screws a lot). I also love the slow close. Really recommend this, especially with the bidet.

This is a great purchase but for someone who owns the lux bidet (two of them) they should offer the option of a bundle with the bidet. using your current seat is not practical even with bumper under the seat

Bought this at the same time as a LUXE Neo 185. Super easy to install, has not slipped once after months of use. This seat sits flat against the toilet, unlike some other seats that lose contact when installed with a bidet and then flex when you sit down.The best part is, with the quick attach system, if we ever need to replace the seat we can just pop the old one off and leave everything else in place. Thanks LUXE!
